security-warning.varnostna-opozorila: Ne nanesite prekomerno. Ne nanesite na poškodovano in občutljivo kožo. V primeru alergijske reakcije prekinite z uporabo.

ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Aluminium Chlorohydrate, PPG-15, Stearyl Ether, Steareth-2, Triethyl Citrate, Parfum, Steareth-21, Talc, BHT, Magnesium Aluminium Silicate, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Cinnamate, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Coumarin, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol.

product-info.opis: Borotalco Intensive deo roll on nudi učinkovito 48-urno zaščito. Dermatološko testirano.

contact-information.kontakt:: Bolton Adriatic d.o.o., Polje 12, 5290 Šempeter pri Gorici
